project_request: Build a comprehensive user profile management system that allows users to view, edit, and manage their account information

questions.question: What is the primary user problem we're solving with this profile management system?
questions.rationale: Understanding the core problem helps prioritize features and ensure we're building the right solution
questions.decision: Users currently have no way to update their information after signup, leading to outdated profiles and support requests for basic changes

questions.question: Which profile fields are essential vs. optional for our users?
options: Mix of required and optional fields
questions.rationale: Determines validation logic and user experience
questions.decision: Mix of required and optional fields
rejected_alternatives: All fields required - too restrictive, reduces signup conversion
Everything optional except email - insufficient data for personalization

questions.question: What privacy controls do users need for their profile information?
questions.rationale: Privacy requirements impact data model and UI complexity
rejected_alternatives: Public/Private toggle - not flexible enough for user needs
No privacy controls - users expect privacy options in 2024

questions.question: Should users be able to delete their account from the profile page?
questions.rationale: GDPR compliance and user autonomy considerations
rejected_alternatives: Require contacting support - creates friction and support burden
Keep deletion separate - users expect this option in profile settings

questions.question: What's the maximum file size for profile picture uploads?
questions.rationale: Impacts storage costs and upload performance
rejected_alternatives: 2MB - too restrictive for modern phone cameras
10MB - unnecessary storage cost for profile pictures

questions.question: Should profile changes be saved automatically or require explicit save action?
options: Hybrid - auto-save some fields, manual for others
questions.rationale: Affects user experience and error handling approach
rejected_alternatives: Auto-save on every change - can cause race conditions and confusing UX
Hybrid approach - inconsistent behavior confuses users

questions.question: Do we need to maintain a profile edit history/audit log?
rejected_alternatives: Full audit log - overkill for initial version, can add later if needed
No tracking - need at least basic metadata for support purposes
